name: ContentFolder
description: Represents a folder in Salesforce CRM Content.
summary: The {ContentFolder} object in the {salesforce} application represents a folder that contains content. It has attributes such as Id, IsDeleted, Name, CreatedDate, CreatedById, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedById, SystemModstamp, and ParentContentFolderId. The Id attribute is of type id, IsDeleted is of type boolean, Name is of type string, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, and SystemModstamp are of type datetime, and CreatedById, LastModifiedById, and ParentContentFolderId are of type reference.
label: Content Folder
